name: @groww-tech/stylelint-config
description: Standard Stylelint config adopted in Groww. Customized as per requirement and preferences of devs in Groww.

scripts.pushTags: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag -a v$PACKAGE_VERSION -m "@groww-tech/stylelint-config-v$PACKAGE_VERSION" && git push --tags
